results.title: OXYTAP - The World's First Oxygen Supplement Infuser
results.content: Founded by Wilson, a technologist with a diverse background spanning defense to environmental sectors, OxyTap embarked on a mission to address the ongoing issue of oxygen deficiency in the world. Wilson's relentless pursuit of a solution led to a remarkable discovery: the infusion of high levels of oxygen into water.
results.raw_content:
As featured in:
COMPONENTS
OXYTAP Infuser Nozzle
OXYTAP Re-useable Plastic Bottles
Our Brand Story
In 2019, against the backdrop of decreasing oxygen levels in the world and the pressing challenges posed by a global pandemic, OxyTap emerged as a beacon of hope in the battle against the deficit of oxygen in our bodies. Oxygen, a forgotten nutrient, took center stage as the key to optimal health, surpassing all other supplements in its significance.
Founded by Wilson, a technologist with a diverse background spanning defense to environmental sectors, OxyTap embarked on a mission to address the ongoing issue of oxygen deficiency in the world. Wilson's relentless pursuit of a solution led to a remarkable discovery: the infusion of high levels of oxygen into water.
With this groundbreaking innovation, OxyTap was born. Recognizing that oxygen is a forgotten nutrient, essential for our vitality and well-being, the brand set out to offer a practical and accessible solution. By infusing oxygen into water, OxyTap provides a convenient and effective way to replenish and optimize our bodies' oxygen levels.
As the global pandemic underscored the importance of respiratory health, OxyTap's mission became even more crucial. The brand's commitment to delivering oxygen in a safe and efficient manner made it a powerful ally in the pursuit of a healthier world.
Today, OxyTap stands as a symbol of transformation and empowerment. Its oxygen-infused water products have reached individuals worldwide, revitalizing lives and reminding us of the significance of this forgotten nutrient. OxyTap remains dedicated to pushing boundaries and driving innovation, ensuring that oxygen reclaims its rightful place as the ultimate supplement for a vibrant and fulfilling life.
Join OxyTap on its mission to empower lives by embracing the power of oxygen. Experience the difference as we strive to overcome the ongoing issue of oxygen deficiency, one refreshing sip at a time.

As the global pandemic underscored the importance of respiratory health, OxyTap's mission became even more crucial. The brand's commitment to delivering oxygen in a safe and efficient manner made it a powerful ally in the pursuit of a healthier world.

Its oxygen-infused water products have reached individuals worldwide, revitalizing lives and reminding us of the significance of this forgotten nutrient. results.title: OxyTap Launches OxyTap 5: The World's First Regenerative Oxygen ...
results.content: Our mission is to empower individuals to take control of their health and well-being by providing cutting-edge products and technologies that help them achieve their goals.At OxyTap, we believe...
results.raw_content:
OxyTap Launches OxyTap 5: The World's First Regenerative Oxygen Supplement Infuser at IFA Berlin 2023
OxyTap Pte Ltd launches OxyTap 5, a revolutionary regenerative oxygen supplement infuser that increases oxygen levels in the body. The device transforms regular water into oxygen-enriched water, boosting vitality and promoting a healthier lifestyle.
Singapore - September 4, 2023
—
OxyTap Pte Ltd a leading innovator in health and wellness solutions is proud to announce the launch of OxyTap 5 an innovative regenerative oxygen supplement infuser. The groundbreaking device will be unveiled at the IFA Berlin 2023 one of the world's premier consumer electronics exhibitions.
OxyTap 5 is a revolutionary product that addresses the global need for increased oxygen levels in the body. As we age and face the challenges posed by the global pandemic our body's ability to absorb and utilize oxygen diminishes. OxyTap 5 provides a solution by allowing individuals to increase their oxygen levels through a simple and convenient drinking experience.
The technology behind OxyTap 5 leverages the latest advancements in oxygen supplement delivery systems. Through a proprietary process the device transforms regular water into oxygen-enriched water ensuring optimal absorption by the body. With the OxyTap 5 users can now effortlessly replenish lost oxygen boosting their overall vitality and promoting a healthier lifestyle.
"We are thrilled to introduce OxyTap 5 the world's first regenerative oxygen therapy supplement infuser said Mr Wilson Tan CEO of OxyTap Pte Ltd. "This innovative product represents a significant leap forward in improving the wellness and vitality of individuals worldwide. With OxyTap 5 users can easily incorporate oxygen supplementation into their daily routine unlocking the full potential of a healthier future."
OxyTap 5's sleek and compact design makes it perfect for use at home in the office or while traveling. The device is user-friendly and features a simple one-touch operation allowing individuals of all ages to easily benefit from increased oxygen levels. OxyTap 5 is also able to generate different oxygen dosages for health, wellness and sports applications.
OxyTap Pte Ltd invites you to experience the future of oxygen supplementation at the IFA Berlin 2023 from September 1st to 6th. Visit our booth at The Singapore Pavilion Hall 5.2A Stand #019 to learn more about OxyTap 5 and witness first-hand how it can revolutionize your health and well-being.
For more information about OxyTap 5 and to inquire about distribution opportunities, please contact our sales team at sales@oxytap.com, call +65 91130711 or visit: https://oxytap.com/
About OxyTap Pte Ltd:
OxyTap Pte Ltd is a leading innovator in health and wellness solutions. Our mission is to empower individuals to take control of their health and well-being by providing cutting-edge products and technologies that help them achieve their goals.At OxyTap, we believe that oxygen is the key to unlocking human potential. That's why we've developed the OxyTap 5, a revolutionary regenerative oxygen supplement infuser that increases oxygen levels in the body, boosting vitality and promoting a healthier lifestyle.Our team of experts is dedicated to advancing the science of oxygen supplementation and exploring new ways to help people live their best lives. With our innovative products and commitment to excellence, we're changing the way people think about health and wellness.Join us on our mission to empower individuals and transform the way they live, work, and play.
﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿

OxyTap Launches OxyTap 5: Regenerative Oxygen Supplement Infuser at IFA Berlin 2023
OxyTap Pte Ltd launches OxyTap 5, a regenerative oxygen supplement infuser that increases oxygen levels in the body. The device transforms regular water into oxygen-enriched water, boosting vitality and promoting a healthier lifestyle.
Ang Mo Kio, Singapore--(Newsfile Corp. - September 6, 2023) - OxyTap Pte Ltd, a leading innovator in health and wellness solutions, is proud to announce the launch of OxyTap 5 an innovative regenerative oxygen supplement infuser. The inventive device will be unveiled at the IFA Berlin 2023, one of the world's premier consumer electronics exhibitions.
OxyTap Launches OxyTap 5: Regenerative Oxygen Supplement Infuser at IFA Berlin 2023
To view an enhanced version of this graphic, please visit:https://images.newsfilecorp.com/files/8814/179534_d7c050b9f4c4c906_001full.jpg
OxyTap 5 is a revolutionary product that addresses the global need for increased oxygen levels in the body. OxyTap 5 provides a solution by allowing individuals to increase their oxygen levels through a simple and convenient drinking experience.
The technology behind OxyTap 5 leverages the latest advancements in oxygen supplement delivery systems. Through a proprietary process, the device transforms regular water into oxygen-enriched water, ensuring optimal absorption by the body. With the OxyTap 5, users can now effortlessly replenish lost oxygen boosting their overall vitality and promoting a healthier lifestyle. The device is user-friendly and features a simple one-touch operation, allowing individuals of all ages to easily benefit from increased oxygen levels. OxyTap 5 is also able to generate different oxygen dosages for health, wellness and sports applications.
"We are thrilled to introduce OxyTap 5 the world's first regenerative oxygen therapy supplement infuser, said Mr. Wilson Tan, CEO of OxyTap Pte Ltd. "This innovative product represents a significant leap forward in improving the wellness and vitality of individuals worldwide. With OxyTap 5, users can easily incorporate oxygen supplementation into their daily routine, unlocking the full potential of a healthier future."
OxyTap Pte Ltd invites interested parties to experience the future of oxygen supplementation at the IFA Berlin 2023 from September 1st to 6th. Visit OxyTap's booth at The Singapore Pavilion Hall 5.2A Stand #019 to learn more about OxyTap 5 and witness it first-hand.
For more information about OxyTap 5 and to inquire about distribution opportunities, please contact the company's sales team at sales@oxytap.com, call +65 91130711 or visit: https://oxytap.com/.
About OxyTap Pte Ltd:
OxyTap Pte Ltd is a leading innovator in health and wellness solutions. OxyTap's mission is to empower individuals to take control of their health and well-being by providing cutting-edge products and technologies that help them achieve their goals. At OxyTap, we believe that oxygen is the key to unlocking human potential. That's why we've developed the OxyTap 5, a revolutionary regenerative oxygen supplement infuser that increases oxygen levels in the body, boosting vitality and promoting a healthier lifestyle. The team of experts is dedicated to advancing the science of oxygen supplementation and exploring new ways to help people live their best lives. With their innovative products and commitment to excellence, we're changing the way people think about health and wellness. Join them on a mission to empower individuals and transform the way they live, work, and play.

September 06, 2023 1:19 AM EDT | Source: Plentisoft

results.title: Oxytap Pte Ltd Launches 5th Generation Oxytap, The World's First ...
results.content: Singapore - May 19, 2023 — Oxytap Pte Ltd, a leading technology company that specializes in health, wellness, and sustainability, announced today the launch of the 5th generation of its Oxytap product, the world's first regenerative oxygen liquid infuser with built-in sensors.
results.raw_content:
Oxytap Pte Ltd Launches 5th Generation Oxytap, The World's First Regenerative Oxygen Liquid Infuser
Oxytap is a new product that uses patented technologies to produce high-quality, oxygen-enriched water from any clean water source. The system regenerates and self-generates pure healthy oxygen from the supplied water and stabilizes high dissolved oxygen in the water, which stays in the
Singapore - May 19, 2023
—
Oxytap Pte Ltd, a leading technology company that specializes in health, wellness, and sustainability, announced today the launch of the 5th generation of its Oxytap product, the world's first regenerative oxygen liquid infuser with built-in sensors. Oxytap is an innovative product that utilizes patented technologies to produce high-quality, oxygen water from any clean water source. The launch date for the latest Oxytap model is set on May 21, 2023.
The new Oxytap system is equipped with three patented technologies, an ozone removal filter, integrated oxygen generator, dual pumping fluid pump, and oxygen water maker. These technologies work together seamlessly to produce a 3x Alpine high healthy oxygen level water in just three minutes of operation. The system regenerates and self-generates pure healthy oxygen from the supplied water and stabilizes high dissolved oxygen in the water, which stays in the water throughout the day.
Oxytap is designed to be fast and convenient. It works right out of the box, and no messy piping of fixtures is needed, just plug and tap. The product is compact in size and sits on a tabletop, making it convenient for use in homes, offices, and gyms.
Oxytap is a sustainable solution that allows users to take any clean water and produce their own high oxygen water at home with any reusable bottle or container. The system eliminates plastic waste and cartridge waste associated with traditional water purification systems, making it an environmentally friendly solution.
Wellness benefits of the Oxytap system are also significant. Improved concentration, skin rejuvenation, hangover relief, palate cleanser for connoisseurs, and epicureans, are just some of the benefits of consuming oxygen water. With Oxytap, customers can enjoy these benefits conveniently and without the need for additional purchases.
Oxytap with its patented regenerative oxygen liquid infusion technology specialize in oxygenating water for a broad market, including wellness and sports enthusiasts, connoisseurs, and epicureans. The product is designed to meet the needs of people who prioritize sustainable, healthy, and convenient living. With the Oxytap system, people can enjoy oxygen-rich water easily, increasing overall quality of life.
"Oxytap represents a major breakthrough in the beverage industry. We are thrilled to introduce the 5th generation of our Oxytap oxygen liquid infuser system. The new Oxytap model is a game-changer for anyone who values wellness, sustainability, and convenience," said Wilson, CEO of Oxytap Pte Ltd.
With the Oxytap system, everyone now can enjoy fresh oxygen water easily.
For more information about Oxytap, please visit the website at oxytap.com"
About Us: About Oxytap Pte Ltd
Oxytap Pte Ltd is a leading technology company that specializes in health, wellness, and sustainability. Headquartered in Singapore, Oxytap is dedicated to innovating products that enrich people's lives.
Oxytap's flagship product is the Oxytap oxygen liquid infuser system, the world's first regenerative system that produces high-quality oxygen water. Using patented technologies, the Oxytap system regenerates and infuses pure oxygen into water, resulting in refreshing oxygen water with a high dissolved oxygen level.
Oxytap's mission is to create innovative wellness products that are sustainable, healthy, and convenient. The company aims to meet the needs of people who value an eco-friendly lifestyle. By giving people an easy way to enjoy the benefits of oxygen water, Oxytap strives to enhance quality of life for health and wellness enthusiasts worldwide.
For more information, please visit oxytap.com.
Contact Info: Name: Winston YapEmail: Send EmailOrganization: Oxytap Pte LtdWebsite: http://www.oxytap.com
Video URL: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gtshGxekSeE
Release ID: 89097981

OxyTap Launches OxyTap 5: Regenerative Oxygen Supplement Infuser at IFA Berlin 2023
Ang Mo Kio, Singapore--(Newsfile Corp. - September 6, 2023) - OxyTap Pte Ltd, a leading innovator in health and wellness solutions, is proud to announce the launch of OxyTap 5 an innovative regenerative oxygen supplement infuser. The inventive device will be unveiled at the IFA Berlin 2023, one of the world's premier consumer electronics exhibitions.
OxyTap Launches OxyTap 5: Regenerative Oxygen Supplement Infuser at IFA Berlin 2023
To view an enhanced version of this graphic, please visit:https://images.newsfilecorp.com/files/8814/179534_d7c050b9f4c4c906_001full.jpg
OxyTap 5 is a revolutionary product that addresses the global need for increased oxygen levels in the body. OxyTap 5 provides a solution by allowing individuals to increase their oxygen levels through a simple and convenient drinking experience.
The technology behind OxyTap 5 leverages the latest advancements in oxygen supplement delivery systems. Through a proprietary process, the device transforms regular water into oxygen-enriched water, ensuring optimal absorption by the body. With the OxyTap 5, users can now effortlessly replenish lost oxygen boosting their overall vitality and promoting a healthier lifestyle. The device is user-friendly and features a simple one-touch operation, allowing individuals of all ages to easily benefit from increased oxygen levels. OxyTap 5 is also able to generate different oxygen dosages for health, wellness and sports applications.
"We are thrilled to introduce OxyTap 5 the world's first regenerative oxygen therapy supplement infuser, said Mr. Wilson Tan, CEO of OxyTap Pte Ltd. "This innovative product represents a significant leap forward in improving the wellness and vitality of individuals worldwide. With OxyTap 5, users can easily incorporate oxygen supplementation into their daily routine, unlocking the full potential of a healthier future."
OxyTap Pte Ltd invites interested parties to experience the future of oxygen supplementation at the IFA Berlin 2023 from September 1st to 6th. Visit OxyTap's booth at The Singapore Pavilion Hall 5.2A Stand #019 to learn more about OxyTap 5 and witness it first-hand.
For more information about OxyTap 5 and to inquire about distribution opportunities, please contact the company's sales team at [email protected], call +65 91130711 or visit: https://oxytap.com/.
About OxyTap Pte Ltd:
OxyTap Pte Ltd is a leading innovator in health and wellness solutions. OxyTap's mission is to empower individuals to take control of their health and well-being by providing cutting-edge products and technologies that help them achieve their goals. At OxyTap, we believe that oxygen is the key to unlocking human potential. That's why we've developed the OxyTap 5, a revolutionary regenerative oxygen supplement infuser that increases oxygen levels in the body, boosting vitality and promoting a healthier lifestyle. The team of experts is dedicated to advancing the science of oxygen supplementation and exploring new ways to help people live their best lives. With their innovative products and commitment to excellence, we're changing the way people think about health and wellness. Join them on a mission to empower individuals and transform the way they live, work, and play.
Contact Info:Name: Wilson TanEmail: [email protected]Organization: Oxytap Pte LtdAddress: 5008 Ang Mo Kio Ave 5, #04-09 Techplace II, Singapore 569874Phone: +65 91130711Website: http://www.oxytap.com
To view the source version of this press release, please visit https://www.newsfilecorp.com/release/179534
Newsfile Corp. is a press release service for companies of all sizes. With a distribution of over 6,000 media and financial databases, Newsfile delivers press releases to a global audience.
